sequence:
Together with Souryuu

<size=45>Chapter 3: What are Friends?</size>

scripts.say: As a natural result of having her teach me hanafuda, I found more and more time to converse with Souryuu.
I decided to head over to her place again today.
Sakura Dorms - Souryuu's Room
Why'd you come here by yourself, Z23? Aren't you usually always with your friends?
Ahaha... I wouldn't say "always." Even I need some time for myself now and then.
And even though we're good friends, we sometimes get on each others' nerves.
You have a point. I imagine it can be hard to deal with Ayanami and Laffey since they like to do things at their own pace.
Ah, um, it's not that bad. Compared to us, I'd say that the Sakura carriers have more than their fair share of... strong personalities.
You don't have to pull your punches. *sigh*... We definitely do have a handful of oddballs...
Ahaha... I feel like we have a lot of common ground. Don't you ever get tired of dealing with the others?
I wouldn't say I get tired, but... Kaga's obsessed with combat, and let's not talk about Akagi...
Shoukaku won't stop poking and prodding at Akagi, and Zuikaku is a bit like my sister. Way too much energy.
*sigh*... Sometimes, I wonder if my reputation as a workaholic resulted from having to clean up after them...
Ahaha...
You know what they say, "you don't get to choose your own family." But, looking back, I don't think I'd want it any other way.
I totally get it, "we're friends after all!" "Who the hell are you calling your friend?!" That kind of dynamic!
I think it's a bit different for us. I wouldn't even say that we're "friends."
But, there is a deeper bond connecting all of us.
A relationship that can't be described by words... That sounds a bit enviable when you put it that way.
I'm also a bit jealous of you and your friends. Hehe.
But more importantly... Commander, didn't anyone ever teach you that it's rude to eavesdrop?
Ah... Good morning, Commander!
Good grief... But since you're already here, we might as well chat for a bit.
Time flew as the three of us chatted the day away.
